ModMetaData.name: Skill Potions 1.4
ModMetaData.author: Kegarr & Copper Boltwire
ModMetaData.description: This mod adds uncraftable skill potions. The potions work exactly like a vanilla skilltrainers but have tech level of medieval. Special shout out to iforgotmysocks on the Rimworld Mod Market for letting me use their C# code!
